job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Want to help everyday Americans invest and build wealth Financial inequality is increasing and too many people are getting left behind At Stash we are passionate about democratizing wealth creation through education advice and products that help customers achieve greater financial freedombrbrStash is seeking Principal Machine Learning Engineers to join our engineering teambrbrThis role focuses on shipping MLdriven features that enhance the steady building of wealth and spend management for millions of our customersbrbrAs a senior technical leader you will work across many functions in the company from Design Modeling Engineering Growth Support and Fraud Prevention to enable sophisticated AI solutions at scale We are looking for a technical leader with motivation to build beautiful intuitive products with empathy for our customers This is a careerdefining opportunity where you can help bring to market new categories of products including crypto productsbrbrstrongYou willbrbrstrongul liPlay a technical leadership role influencing collaborating and contributing to MLdriven product features that seamlessly help improve the customers financial conditionli liHelp lead the companys machine learning technical direction to pursue opportunities that make the larger organization more efficientli liDevelop entity graphs feature stores model training and model serving capabilities in a faulttolerant distributed computing environmentli liCollaborate with Data Scientists in building highly scalable ML models for NLP Fraud Prevention Growth Recommenders Personalization and other use casesli liUnderstand industry and companywide trends to help develop new technologiesli brulstrongQualificationsbrbrstrongul li8 years of experience in one or more of the following areas statistical classifiers to deep learning reinforcement learning NLP personalized AI agents or recommendersli li12 years of experience in programming languages Python C Java or Scala li liProven track record of planning multiyear technical roadmap where shortterm releases ladder into the longterm visionli liExperience communicating and working across functions to drive solutionsli liExperience in mentoringinfluencing senior engineers across organizationsli liEagerness to share your own ideas and openness to those of othersli liExperience with cloud computing platforms such as AWS Google Cloud or Azureli brulAt Stash it is our mission to help everyday Americans invest and build wealth That includes people of all races genders and abilities so it is important to us to acknowledge and address the issues of inequality in financial services head onbrbrDiversity and inclusion are essential to living our values promoting innovation and building the best products Our success is directly related to our employees and we believe that our team should reflect the diversity of the customers that we serve As an Equal Opportunity Employer Stash is committed to building an inclusive environment for people of all backgroundsbrbrIf you require any reasonable accommodations to make your application process more accessible please reach out to
